app.title: BodyMetrics
app.subtitle: Segmental Body Composition Analysis with total privacy.

dashboard.client_exists_message: Client ID or Alias already exists. Please try a different name.
dashboard.inbox_empty: All clean! No pending measurements to link, or the SD files have not been loaded.
dashboard.select_client_prompt: Select a client from the list to view their progress.
dashboard.delete_client_confirm: Are you sure? This client will be deleted and measurements sent back to Inbox.
dashboard.no_data_client: This client has no linked measurements yet or the SD files have not been loaded.
dashboard.no_clients_created: You haven't created any clients yet

help.starting_installation_text: To use full screen and offline, look for **'Install App'** or **'Add to Home Screen'** in your browser's menu (mobile) or navigation bar (PC).
To use full screen and offline, look for **'Install App'** or **'Add to Home Screen'** in your browser menu.
help.starting_first_steps_text:
1. Go to the **Inbox** tab.
2. Drag the `DATA.CSV` files from your SD card.
3. If it's your first time, go to **Clients** and create a profile.
4. Return to **Inbox** and click **Link** to assign that measurement to your client.
help.clients_creation_text: We recommend using **Codes** (e.g., `CLI-001`) or **Aliases** (e.g., `JUAN PR`) instead of real names. Keep a private spreadsheet outside the app linking `CLI-001` or `JUAN PR` to the real name for maximum security.
help.clients_buttons_logic_text:
The scale only has 4 memory slots. We recommend this strategy:

‚Ä¢ **Buttons 1, 2 & 3:** Use for yourself or fixed family members.
‚Ä¢ **Button 4 (Wildcard):** Use it for measuring multiple clients using the trick below.
help.clients_infinite_trick_text:
To use **Button 4** with hundreds of people without deleting history:

1. ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE SD CARD** from scale.
2. Hold **SET**, choose User 4 (Wildcard).
3. Edit age, height, gender and activity (using **Arrows**) and confirm (using **SET**).
4. When asked **CLr?** (Clear), say **YES**.
5. üíæ **INSERT SD CARD** now and weigh.

**Result:** The new data is saved to `DATA4.CSV` without overwriting previous records.
help.files_where_text:
The scale saves data in specific files based on the physical button pressed:
‚Ä¢ **Button 1:** `DATA1.CSV` (and `DATA5.CSV` when full).
‚Ä¢ **Button 2:** `DATA2.CSV` (and `DATA6.CSV`).
‚Ä¢ **Button 3:** `DATA3.CSV` (and `DATA7.CSV`).
‚Ä¢ **Button 4:** `DATA4.CSV` (and `DATA8.CSV`).
help.files_structure_text: The app reads the `DATA.CSV` file but **does not modify the SD**. It creates a **'virtual link'** in the browser between the measurement date and the Client you choose.
help.files_troubleshooting_text:
If your SD card has years of history, **DO NOT load all files at once**.

**Do it in batches:**
1. Load only the button 1 files (`DATA1.CSV` and `DATA5.CSV`) into **Inbox**.
2. Use the **Multiple Linking** button to assign all measurements to the desired Client (e.g., My Mother).
3. Now drag or load the button 2 files (`DATA2.CSV` and `DATA6.CSV`) and link the measurements to another client (e.g., My Daughter).
4. Repeat for all buttons.

Once the old data is organized, you can use button 4 for new measurements and load all files together.
help.interpretation_main_metrics_text:
‚Ä¢ **Body Fat & BMI:** Blue (Low), Green (Healthy), Yellow (Overweight), Red (Obese).
‚Ä¢ **Water %:** Ideal is **45-60%** (Female) and **50-65%** (Male).
‚Ä¢ **Visceral Fat:** **1-12** (Healthy), **13+** (Excessive).
‚Ä¢ **Metabolic Age:** Green if **‚â§ real age** (Efficient metabolism). Yellow if higher.
help.interpretation_segmental_text: Detects asymmetries to prevent injury. For example, if **Right Leg** has less muscle than **Left** after recovery, or typical imbalances in sports (e.g. Tennis player's dominant arm).
help.interpretation_health_states_text: Healthy ranges are not fixed: the app calculates them automatically following **Tanita's official manual**, adapting to the client's exact age and gender for each measurement.
help.interpretation_export_text: In each client's profile, click **Spreadsheet** to download a clean `.csv` with full history. Compatible with **Excel**, **LibreOffice**, or **Google Sheets**.
help.security_local_data_text: BodyMetrics has no cloud server. **Your data never leaves your device**.
help.security_link_text: Remember: The app lives in your browser. If you clear cache ('browsing data'), links are lost, but **your SD data remains safe** on the card.
help.security_backups_text: Since data lives in the browser, it is **vital** to go to Settings > **Download Backup** regularly. This generates a file named like `bm_backup_2025...json`.
help.security_restoration_text:
Go to Settings > **Load Backup** to recover data after clearing cache or switching devices.

**Manual Sync:** You can transfer the `bm_backup...json` file between PC and Mobile. If you link a new measurement on one device, remember to **download backup and load it on the other** to keep both updated to the latest version.
help.troubleshooting_common_text:
‚Ä¢ For new measurements: `DATA.CSV` files from the SD card.
‚Ä¢ To restore the app: The `bm_backup...json` file created in Settings.
help.troubleshooting_missing_data_text:
‚Ä¢ Every time you close or refresh the app **you must reload the SD files**.
‚Ä¢ Make sure to load **all** `DATA.CSV` files from the DATA folder to reactivate the client links.
help.troubleshooting_date_text: If measurements appear in 2010 or with odd times, the **scale's internal clock** has reset (e.g., after battery change). You must set the correct date/time using the physical buttons on the scale.

about.title: About BodyMetrics
about.description: FOSS (Free and Open Source Software) application for secure and private segmental body composition analysis.
about.disclaimer: Independent project. Not affiliated with Tanita Corp.

upload.instruction_path: Look on your SD card for folder: /TANITA/GRAPHV1/DATA/
upload.drop_zone: Drag here all .CSV files from that folder
upload.browse: Or click to browse the SD card
upload.error: No valid measurements found. Please ensure the files are DATA.CSV and come from the DATA folder on the SD card.

settings.title: Settings & Security
settings.backup_desc: The Database is saved locally. Download a .json backup regularly.
settings.import_error: File does not look like a valid backup.
settings.delete_all_confirm: Are you sure? This will delete ALL client lists and links from this browser.

alerts.link_success: Measurement successfully linked to client history.
alerts.export_empty: No measurements available to export for this client.
alerts.backup_error: The file is corrupted or not a valid backup.
alerts.reset_success: Factory reset complete. All data has been erased.
alerts.reset_confirm: Are you sure? This will delete ALL client lists and links from this browser. This cannot be undone.
alerts.delete_client_confirm: Are you sure? This client will be deleted and their measurements will return to the Inbox.
alerts.reset_success: All data has been deleted successfully.

tooltips.measurement_card_description:
Cards change color based on health status:

‚Ä¢ Green: Healthy
‚Ä¢ Yellow: High
‚Ä¢ Red: Very high
‚Ä¢ Blue: Low
tooltips.visceral_fat_description:
Fat surrounding internal organs.

Healthy range: 1-12
High risk: 13+
tooltips.metabolic_age_description:
Compares metabolism to real age.

‚Ä¢ Green: <= real age (Efficient)
‚Ä¢ Yellow: > real age

first_use.title: First Use Guide
first_use.step_inbox_description: Here you load the data. Look in the SD card for the `/TANITA/GRAPHV1/DATA/` folder and **drag all `DATA.CSV` files here**. (Careful: avoid files from the 'system' folder).
first_use.step_clients_description: Manage profiles. Create Clients here first (use aliases for privacy) then go to the Inbox tab to **link** new measurements to each one.
first_use.step_settings_description: Your security. Data is saved only in this browser. Download a **Backup** regularly to not lose your work if cache is cleared.
first_use.step_help_description: Manual and Tricks. Check here the complete guide, metric interpretation and step-by-step for the 'Infinite Users' (Wildcard) trick.
